content.body: is there a name for zipping iterators where the iteration goes until specifically the first iterator is empty
instead of the shortest or longest iterator
I haven't heard of one, but `zip-first` is the obvious name from the standard naming scheme
content.formatted_body: I haven't heard of one, but zip-first is the obvious name from the standard naming scheme

content.body: what do you do if the first one is shorter than the second?
